Song.title: Jesus Came To Earth
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Solomon Campbell, Dave Campbell, and Bob Kauflin Â© 2004 Sovereign Grace Worship (ASCAP) and Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D2 | D2 | D2 | D2 | G2 | G2 | Asus A | A |]
Verse: [D2]Jesus came to earth He [D2]lived a perfect life He [D2]died upon the cross Then He [A7]rose from the dead [G]Now He is in heaven [D]Seated on His throne At the [A7sus]right hand of the Father [| A] Where [A7sus]heaven is His home [| A]
Chorus: We [D/F#]praise You, [G]Je[D]sus, Son of [Asus | A]God We [D/F#]praise You, [G]Je[D]sus, Son of [Asus | A]Man You [D/F#]left Your [G]throne of [D/F#]grace To suffer [C6]in our [G/B]place So we [Em7]praise You, [A7sus]Jesus [D2 | D2 | G2 | G2 | D]Christ
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse jesus came to earth he lived a perfect life he died upon the cross then he rose from the dead now he is in heaven seated on his throne at the right hand of the father where heaven is his home chorus we praise you jesus son of god we praise you jesus son of man you left your throne of grace to suffer in our place so we praise you jesus christ
